mapper.select: select tran.id, u.name as owner, money, tran.name, tran.expectedDate, c.name as customerId, tran.stage, tran.type, tran.source, a.name as activityId, con.fullname as contactsId, tran.createBy, tran.createTime, tran.editBy, tran.editTime, tran.description, tran.contactSummary, tran.nextContactTime from tbl_tran tran join tbl_user u on tran.owner = u.id join tbl_customer c on tran.customerId = c.id left join tbl_activity a on tran.activityId = a.id left join tbl_contacts con on tran.contactsId = con.id where tran.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran ( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime ) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
